definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: In a village there lived two men who had the self-same name.
sentences.chinese: 過去有兩個人住在一個村子裏。

sentences.english: Wood carving are a specialty of this village.
sentences.chinese: 雕刻木器是這個村子的特產。

sentences.english: The car sped along the road towards the village.
sentences.chinese: 汽車沿公路朝那村子疾駛而去。

sentences.english: Next, there was a knock on the door of the village shoe-maker.
sentences.chinese: 然後，村子的鞋匠聽到了敲門聲。

sentences.english: The farmers had to fetch water from a river which was a mile away from the village.
sentences.chinese: 家民們得從離村子一里路遠的河裏取來水。

sentences.english: The representative's proposal is that a middle school (should) be founded in this village.
sentences.chinese: 這位代表的建議是在這個村子裏建一所中學。

sentences.english: I strolled into the village, and perceived that it was a town.
sentences.chinese: 我信步在那村子裏走着，我發現那是個城。

sentences.english: The village in an out-of-the-way mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 這個村子位於一個偏僻的山區。

sentences.english: The nearest hospital is an hour away by car.
sentences.chinese: 離村子最近的醫院，坐車需要一小時。

sentences.english: On the other side is afisherman's village, where people live in the worst squalor.
sentences.chinese: 在另外一邊是漁村，那個村子裏的人活在糞坑中。

sentences.english: If the enemy dare ener the village, we'll fight against them to the end.
sentences.chinese: 如果敵人敢進入村子，我們將和他們戰鬥到底。

sentences.english: A collapsed home in Sukagawa city, in the northern part of the country.
sentences.chinese: 須賀川市村子北部倒塌的家。

sentences.english: In the center of the village was a big windmill. A gray church stood across from the windmill.
sentences.chinese: 村子中央有一座很大的風車，對面是一座灰色的教堂。

sentences.english: The houses in this village are without water.
sentences.chinese: 這個村子裏家家戶戶都沒有自來水。

sentences.english: The village is about eight centimetres away from ITe.
sentences.chinese: 那個村子離這兒大約有八英里遠。

definition: Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
